name: Jeff Bezos
review: Leave the pavement behind and take on challenging conditions with confidence in the First Ever Yukon AT4.

name: Elon Musk
review: f you are interested in buying an electric vehicle, Edmunds' editors are here to help. In this EV buying guide, we'll walk you through what you need to know about EVs and make recommendations tailored to what you're looking for in an electric vehicle.

name: Bernard Arnault
review: With seating arrangements that can accommodate between six and eight passengers, and a range of towing capacities and off-road abilities, there's a 3-row SUV to match every need. Our experts test and evaluate hundreds of vehicles every year, and we're rounding up our highest-rated vehicles to help you pick the best 3-row SUV for your needs.

name: Bill Gates
review: While buyer trends have shifted toward larger SUVs over the last decade, demand for fuel-efficient cars has remained strong. Even as cars have become heavier, advancements in powertrain technologies mean that today's cars are more efficient than yesteryear's.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
review: Mini traditionally offers vehicles that are nicer and more expensive than most mainstream automobiles. But it's trying something different with its all-new Mini Cooper SE.
